TopicTitle: Maybe FEEDBACK: Is using tubes as an adapter cheating?

Articles.Content:
Tubes has ability to convert any size part to any other part. Example S tube has ability to convert to XL and it gives good aerodynamic properties. But using XL to convert to S is worse because it is heavier.

Any tube is better than basic adapter which resizes 1node to 1 node.

Edited December 29, 2023 by Jeq
I don't think it is cheating. It is the magic of science. But maybe it should have the same weight. Nice finding.
Using stockparts the way you want is not cheating, just cheesing.  I`ll have a look into this and share my findings too.
I think it's a problem if any part makes another completely obsolete.
